post.body: - I am also lost in TT at the moment. I am also listening to the most boring convo next to me on the train.
(aka @ravelinchaer) - you are so money. Also, are you and @ewmonster in the same city? Seems like diffr't weather patterns
- ah, that's a good thing as we're always at a loss for something to say. Merry xmas!!
- I am going to need tv celeb details big time.
- welcome to twitter! Get ready to know what I'm doing ALL of the time.
- like that you used the word 'steward'. Hope u safely and I will smackdown someone if u don't get platinum.
- what time does a 6 hour delayed flt leave? Yikes!
just found a plug. I think I enjoy train travel.
is about to lose her battery on the laptop and the BB battery is dying. Maybe I'll write more verses for my VHP tune. G'night fans for now!
just stopped at New Rochelle...wanted to go see the Petries. Props if you get the reference...my money is that @travelinchatter is on it.
is about to have her train "announced". I am SO big city.
Made it back to Penn station. Had to have Gail new stranger friend walk me to the tracks (KPen was going to...she is fantasic).
Kimberly Penharlow is a treat. I may steal her and bring her to all of my trainings.
is at the craziness of grand central - training then quick food then call then call then training then back to Beantown.
has this back by popular demand: http://ping.fm/wmLo8 ...can you hear it? Check out the link within the article.
Dilemma: just finished penning the lyrics to my VHP song, but singing it in my head takes 6 min. Hmmm.
Conductor came and said I could pick a different seat if I wanted. Chose a 4 top. Must go forward.
I'm on the train! Not sure if there are assigned seats, but I think my ticket had a 1F on it, so I'm sitting there.
Guy who looks like a regular train taker who is on my train is waiting. I will just follow him.
has slightly less anxiety now that she is holding a train ticket.
is up and at 'em...yeah, check the how many hours ago and calculate.
got home from the real xmas party... Alana Lombardi does NOT have news other than she had a great party and is a rock star.
hearts Justin A LOT. He has good jokes.
is so wrong on so many different levels. So is @ewmonster.
is so stoked for her VHP Christmas song. @amellerbrock - get ready.
is done with game playing...time to watch tv and hang. Fantastic fantastic xmas as always. I LOVE my family.
Playing Q90...a game kinda like 20 questions on speed. Fun. Guys are terrible at it. I love winning.
I love xmas so so much. Girls won at catch phrase (of course). Chillaxin' with the peeps. What what.
is ready to get her Catch Phrase game on. Merry Christmas everyone!!
just got back from midnight mass...benefit to being a catholic...now I can sleep in! Merry Xmas to my fans.
just wrapped up a fantastic xmas eve. Great slideshow, good laughs, fun times. That was really cheesy.
White Elephant - Bill O'reilly book...really?
1400 pics of xmas and good times past...timeless!
Scanned 400 pictures yesterday (12hrs), transferred 800 from floppy disks today (3hrs), copied 200 from SD cards (1/2hr).
is glad that someone woke her up before her 11am call. I am going to be so rested for 2009.
Playing music catch phrase w/ the fam. I know where my musical ability (note not talent) comes from.
just found out her mom has 50 (yes five-zero) rolls of undeveloped film from the past 10+ yrs. Can't wait to develop it!!
did not wake up to an alarm today and had an hour of being awake w/o checking her BB. Vaca!
Going to dinner with @mkosater and fam.
is excited that VHP is as great as I imagined.
